titles.title: Pharmaceutical SAVE Act
Pharmaceutical Supply and Value Enhancement Act
A bill to allow for the expedited approval of generic prescription drugs and temporary importation of prescription drugs in the case of noncompetitive drug markets and drug shortages.
Pharmaceutical Supply and Value Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
